page.title: 03BILLERICAY NW Farming Year.
page.content: {Seasonal Calendar Of Work. {Spring: }A little sowing; planting potatoes; spraying 3_5 times; cattle out to grass; muck spreading; fencing repairs. {Summer:} Spraying; haymaking; repairing machinery for Autumn; building and repairing; harvesting; baling straw; burning straw; late Summer preparing almost whole farm for sowing; harvesting potatoes. {Autumn/Winter: }Cattle in yards; riddling potatoes; ploughing; hedging; ditching. {Typical Day in Spring. 8 am start _ 6/7 pm finish.5 people involved planting potatoes. 1st task, load bags of seeds onto trailer. In field, person drive tractor to break up the soil; 2 drive the planters; 1 to drive tractor to make ridges. 7 acres planted in a day.
